statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_reports;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_reports WHERE car_id = 123;
SELECT report_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_reports WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_reports ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT AVG(maintenance_cost) AS average_cost FROM maintenance_reports WHERE car_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_reports WHERE car_id = 101 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT report_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_reports WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, SUM(maintenance_cost) AS total_cost FROM maintenance_reports GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_reports WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%oil%' OR maintenance_type LIKE '%tire%' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(maintenance_cost) AS average_cost FROM maintenance_reports WHERE car_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 100;
SELECT car_model, car_year FROM car_fleet ORDER BY car_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_fleet WHERE car_mileage < 50000;
SELECT car_id, car_model, car_mileage FROM car_fleet WHERE car_year >= 2015;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_type DESC, record_id ASC
SELECT car_model, car_year, car_mileage FROM car_fleet WHERE car_year >= 2018 ORDER BY car_year DESC, car_model ASC

SELECT record_id, car_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_records JOIN car_fleet ON maintenance_records.car_id = car_fleet.car_id WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%oil change%' ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation' AND maintenance_cost BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY maintenance_cost ASC, record_id DESC

SELECT car_model, car_year, car_mileage, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM car_fleet JOIN maintenance_records ON car_fleet.car_id = maintenance_records.car_id WHERE car_mileage > 50000 ORDER BY car_mileage DESC, maintenance_cost ASC
SELECT * FROM car_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM car_maintenance WHERE car_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT car_model, car_year FROM car WHERE car_model = 'Toyota' AND car_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_report WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT car_id, total_cost FROM maintenance_report JOIN car ON maintenance_report.car_id = car.car_id WHERE total_cost < 5000;
SELECT * FROM car_maintenance WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT car_model, car_year, COUNT(*) FROM car GROUP BY car_model, car_year;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM car_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY car_id ASC;
SELECT car_id, start_date, end_date, total_cost FROM maintenance_report WHERE total_cost < 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM car_maintenance GROUP BY car_id, maintenance_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cars;
SELECT model, manufacturer FROM Cars WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost < 500;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM Cars WHERE manufacturer='Toyota';
SELECT * FROM Cars WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT model, year FROM Cars WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT Cars.model, Maintenance.maintenance_type, Maintenance.maintenance_cost FROM Cars JOIN Maintenance ON Cars.id = Maintenance.car_id WHERE Cars.manufacturer = 'Honda';

SELECT Maintenance.maintenance_type, MaintenanceHistory.maintenance_date, MaintenanceHistory.mechanic_name FROM Maintenance JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON Maintenance.maintenance_id = MaintenanceHistory.maintenance_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT Car.model AS Car_Model, MR.report_date AS Report_Date, MR.total_cost AS Total_Cost FROM Cars Car JOIN MaintenanceReport MR ON Car.id = MR.car_id WHERE MR.total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY Total_Cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Car WHERE year = 2020
SELECT make, model FROM Car WHERE make = 'Toyota'
SELECT DISTINCT make FROM Car ORDER BY make DESC
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type FROM Maintenance ORDER BY car_id ASC
SELECT report_name, total_maintenance_cost FROM Report WHERE total_maintenance_cost > 1000
SELECT * FROM Car WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year = 2021;
SELECT model, year FROM Car WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT fleet_name, make, model FROM Fleet_Car JOIN Fleet ON Fleet_Car.fleet_id = Fleet.fleet_id JOIN Car ON Fleet_Car.car_id = Car.id;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_maintenance_cost, report_date FROM Report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
